entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain and snow changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
